front.title: Benchmarking Methodology for Service Function Chain Performance

abstract.t: Service Function Chain is the ordered set of service functions such as firewall, Deep Packet Inspection(DPI), virtualized Evolved Packet Core (vEPC), and etc,. Operators make chains with several service functions depending on the service which they have to provide. The chain needs to be evaluated to measure the SLA. This draft describes the benchmarking methodologies for Service Function Chain(SFC) performance and the affecting factors to SFC performance.
